title: The Cigar Authority LE Show w/ Skip Martin
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority LE Show w/ Skip Martin
description: On this episode of The Cigar Authority, we talk about and break down the massive amounts of Limited Edition smokes that are currently on the market, and are rumoured to be entering the market. Is it hurting or helping the cigar industry. Also on hand will be Skip Martin of Romacraft Tobac, and we get to catch up with Chief Hava himself and find out what is new an exciting in Esteli, Nicaragua. All this and more on a Mr. Jonathan free edition of The Cigar Authority. ﻿
